source.name: Current Employee Names, Salaries, and Position Titles
source.description: This dataset is a listing of all current City of Chicago employees, complete with full names, departments, positions, and annual salaries. For hourly employees the annual salary is estimated. Data Owner: Human Resources. Frequency: Data is updated quarterly. For information on the positions and related salaries detailed in the budget as of January 1, 2012, visit the "Budget - Positions and Salaries in 2012 Appropriation Ordinance" dataset: http://bit.ly/twq5oO
